sense.def:
The interval between two events or dates
je čas med dvema dogodkoma ali datumoma.

V gledališki prestai ali na koncertu je
an interval
premor med dvema dejanjema ali deloma.

seg.quote: The audience were going out for the interval.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
at intervals
, se zgodi večkrat, vmes pa so presledki ali premori.

seg.quote: At intervals, the carriage was halted.
They kept coming back at six-month intervals.

sense.def:
Kadar so stvari postavljene
at particular intervals
, so med njimi presledki.

seg.quote: They were scattered through the forest, at varying intervals.
